TEXT.TITLE: LOADMASTER SYSTEMS <LSMIF> NAMES NEW PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Loadmaster Systems Inc said Mark A Cote has been appointed president of the company and its Loadmaster Systems Inc USA subsidiary. The company said he succeeds David L. Shorey who accepted an appointement as president of <Shelf Storage Systems International>. Reuter
